title: Responses
description: A map of HTTP status codes (e.g., 200, 404, default) to Response objects describing each possible outcome of an operation. At least one response must be defined per OpenAPI 3.0. Status code ranges (e.g., 2XX) are not supported — only specific numeric codes and 'default' are valid keys.

responses.description: Contains relationship — the Response nodes mapped to HTTP status codes or 'default' in this Responses object.
